oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Repeated gentle handling in beef cattle: heart rate and behaviour
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schulze Westerath, Heike
Probst, Johanna
Gygox, Lorenz
Hillmann, Edna
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Beef cattle
Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A good animal-human relationship is one important aspect concerning cattle welfare. The aim of this study was to investigate the effect of gentle handling at head and neck on behaviour and heart beat parameters in beef cattle.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Schulze Westerath, Heike; Probst, Johanna; Gygox, Lorenz and Hillmann, Edna (2010) Repeated gentle handling in beef cattle: heart rate and behaviour. In: Lidfors, Lena; Blokhuis, Harry and Keeling, Linda (Eds.) Proceedings of the 44th Congress of the International Society for Applied Ethology (ISAE), Wageningen Academic Publishers, Wageningen, The Netherlands.
